title: [feature request] Component-wise transform of elements for multi-variate distributions
body_html:
Hi Torch devs!

I am thinking of adding a PR with a component-wise transform for multi-variate distributions (under https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/transforms.py).
I already have the code ready, since I am using it to transform Multivariate Normals in a pyro-ppl model.

I read in the contribution guide that potential PRs should be discussed here before. Would you welcome such as a contribution?

Thanks!
Ahmad Salim
